00006 CDoor::CDoor(CMap *pmap, Uint32 x, Uint32 y, Uint32 doorspriteID):
00007 CObject(pmap, x, y, OBJ_DOOR)
00008 {
00009  sprite=doorspriteID;
00010  CSprite &Doorsprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(sprite);
00011  timer = 0;
00012  Doorsprite.setHeight(32);
00013  inhibitfall = true;
00014  x = getXPosition()>>CSF;
00015  y = getYPosition()>>CSF;

00017  mp_Map->redrawAt(x, y+1);
00018 }

00020 void CDoor::process()
00021 {
00022  CSprite &Doorsprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(sprite);
00023 
00024  if (timer > DOOR_OPEN_SPEED)
00025  {
00026   // TODO: Create a flag for mods in which the door can be opened in another direction
00027   //if (DoorOpenDir==DOWN)
00028   moveDown(1<<STC);
00029   Doorsprite.setHeight(Doorsprite.getHeight()-1);
00030   timer = 0;
00031   if (Doorsprite.getHeight() == 0)
00032   {
00033    exists = false;
00034    return;
00035   }
00036  }
00037  else timer++;
00038 }
